H0.text: Which 18th Century composer wrote ‘The Four Seasons’. Bach

H1.text: Which 18th Century composer wrote ‘The Four Seasons’. Handel

H2.text: Which 18th Century composer wrote ‘The Four Seasons’. Telemann

H3.text: Which 18th Century composer wrote ‘The Four Seasons’. Vivaldi

A4.text: Vivaldi wrote the Four Seasons, four violin concertos that give musical expression to the seasons of the year.

A5.text: Le quattro stagioni (The Four Seasons) of 1723 is his most famous work.
